00048 void sim_cont(double *xin, char *vis_file,
00049               int dimy, int dimx,
00050               double *results); 
00051 
00052 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00053 
00054   //Test for continuos visibilities 
00055   double *xin;
00056   purify_image img;
00057   purify_image_filetype filetype_img;
00058   int dimx, dimy, Nx;
00059   double *results;
00060   char vis_file[60];
00061   char snr_file[60];
00062   char dr_file[60];
00063   char time_file[60];
00064   int num_sim=10;
00065   double *snr_res;
00066   double *dr_res;
00067   double *time_res;
00068 
00069   int i, j, k, nc, p;
00070 
00071   FILE *file;
00072   
00073   //Define parameters
00074   dimy = 256;
00075   dimx = 256;
00076   Nx = dimx*dimy;
00077   filetype_img = PURIFY_IMAGE_FILETYPE_FITS;
00078   p = 2;
00079   strcpy(snr_file, "./data/test/res/snr_sim_1.txt");
00080   strcpy(dr_file, "./data/test/res/dr_sim_1.txt");
00081   strcpy(time_file, "./data/test/res/time_sim_1.txt");
00082   
00083   //Allocate memory
00084   xin = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));
00085   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xin);
00086   results = (double*)malloc((24) * sizeof(double));
00087   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(results);
00088 
00089   snr_res = (double*)calloc((8*num_sim) , sizeof(double));
00090   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(snr_res);
00091   dr_res = (double*)calloc((8*num_sim) , sizeof(double));
00092   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dr_res);
00093   time_res = (double*)calloc((8*num_sim) , sizeof(double));
00094   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(time_res);
00095 
00096   // Input image.
00097   img.fov_x = 10.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;
00098   img.fov_y = 10.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;
00099   img.nx = 4;
00100   img.ny = 4;
00101 
00102   purify_image_readfile(&img, "data/images/M31.fits", filetype_img);
00103   
00104   printf("*****************************************\n");
00105   printf("Simulations for coverage: %f \n", (double)p/10.0); 
00106   printf("*****************************************\n\n");
00107 
00108   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00109     xin[i] = 0.0;
00110   }
00111 
00112   for (i=0; i < img.ny; i++){
00113     for (j=0; j < img.nx; j++){
00114       xin[i+j*dimy] = img.pix[i+j*img.ny];
00115     }
00116   }
00117   
00118  for (k = 1; k<=num_sim; k++){
00119     nc = sprintf(vis_file, "./data/test/sim/cont_sim%d_%d.vis", p, k);
00120     
00121     printf("Simulation number: %i \n\n", k);
00122     sim_cont(xin, vis_file, dimy, dimx, results);
00123 
00124     for (i = 0; i < 8; i++){
00125       snr_res[i + (k-1)*8] = results[0 + i*3];
00126     }
00127 
00128     for (i = 0; i < 8; i++){
00129       dr_res[i + (k-1)*8] = results[1 + i*3];
00130     }
00131 
00132     for (i = 0; i < 8; i++){
00133       time_res[i + (k-1)*8] = results[2 + i*3];
00134     }
00135 
00136     // Open file.
00137     file = fopen(snr_file, "w");
00138     if (file == NULL) {
00139       PURIFY_ERROR_GENERIC("Failed to create file ./data/test/snr_sim_2.txt");
00140     }
00141     //Write file
00142     for (i = 0; i < num_sim; i++){
00143       fprintf(file, " %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f\n", 
00144                snr_res[0 + i*8], snr_res[1 + i*8], 
00145                snr_res[2 + i*8], snr_res[3 + i*8],
00146                snr_res[4 + i*8], snr_res[5 + i*8],
00147                snr_res[6 + i*8], snr_res[7 + i*8]);
00148     }
00149     // Close file.
00150     fclose(file);
00151 
00152     // Open file.
00153     file = fopen(dr_file, "w");
00154     if (file == NULL) {
00155       PURIFY_ERROR_GENERIC("Failed to create file ./data/test/dr_sim_2.txt");
00156     }
00157     //Write file
00158     for (i = 0; i < num_sim; i++){
00159       fprintf(file, " %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f\n", 
00160                dr_res[0 + i*8], dr_res[1 + i*8], 
00161                dr_res[2 + i*8], dr_res[3 + i*8],
00162                dr_res[4 + i*8], dr_res[5 + i*8],
00163                dr_res[6 + i*8], dr_res[7 + i*8]);
00164     }
00165     // Close file.
00166     fclose(file);
00167 
00168     // Open file.
00169     file = fopen(time_file, "w");
00170     if (file == NULL) {
00171       PURIFY_ERROR_GENERIC("Failed to create file ./data/test/time_sim_2.txt");
00172     }
00173     //Write file
00174     for (i = 0; i < num_sim; i++){
00175       fprintf(file, " %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f %.10f\n", 
00176                time_res[0 + i*8], time_res[1 + i*8], 
00177                time_res[2 + i*8], time_res[3 + i*8],
00178                time_res[4 + i*8], time_res[5 + i*8],
00179                time_res[6 + i*8], time_res[7 + i*8]);
00180     }
00181     // Close file.
00182     fclose(file);
00183  }
00184   
00185 
00186   
00187   free(xin);
00188   free(results);
00189   purify_image_free(&img);
00190   free(snr_res);
00191   free(dr_res);
00192   free(time_res);
00193   return 0;
00194 
00195 }
00196 
00197 void sim_cont(double *xin, char *vis_file,
00198               int dimy, int dimx,
00199               double *results){
00200 
00201   int i, Nx, Ny, Nr, Nb;
00202   int num_iter=300;
00203   double gamma=0.001;
00204   double aux1, aux2, aux3, aux4;
00205   
00206   int seedn=54;
00207   double sigma;
00208   double a;
00209   double mse;
00210   double snr;
00211   double snr_out;
00212   double  dr_out;
00213 
00214   
00215   purify_visibility_filetype filetype_vis;
00216   complex double *xinc;
00217   complex double *y0;
00218   complex double *y;
00219   complex double *noise;
00220   double *xout;
00221   double *w;
00222   double *error;
00223   complex double *xoutc;
00224   double *wdx;
00225   double *wdy;
00226   
00227 
00228   //parameters for the continuos FT
00229   double *deconv;
00230   purify_sparsemat_row gmat;
00231   purify_visibility vis_test;
00232   purify_measurement_cparam param_m1;
00233   purify_measurement_cparam param_m2;
00234   complex double *fft_temp1;
00235   complex double *fft_temp2;
00236   void *datafwd[5];
00237   void *dataadj[5];
00238   fftw_plan planfwd;
00239   fftw_plan planadj;
00240 
00241   //Structures for sparsity operator
00242   sopt_wavelet_type *dict_types;
00243   sopt_wavelet_type *dict_types1;
00244   sopt_wavelet_type *dict_types2;
00245   sopt_sara_param param5;
00246   sopt_sara_param param8;
00247   sopt_sara_param param9;
00248   void *datas[1];
00249   void *datas1[1];
00250   void *datas2[1];
00251 
00252   //Structures for the opmization problems
00253   sopt_l1_sdmmparam param2;
00254   sopt_l1_rwparam param4;
00255   sopt_prox_tvparam param7;
00256   sopt_tv_sdmmparam param6;
00257   sopt_tv_rwparam param10;
00258 
00259   clock_t start, stop;
00260   double t = 0.0;
00261   double start1, stop1;
00262 
00263   //Define parameters
00264   filetype_vis = PURIFY_VISIBILITY_FILETYPE_PROFILE_VIS;
00265 
00266   purify_visibility_readfile(&vis_test,
00267              vis_file,
00268              filetype_vis);
00269   
00270   printf("Number of visibilities: %i \n\n", vis_test.nmeas);  
00271   
00272 
00273   param_m1.nmeas = vis_test.nmeas;
00274   param_m1.ny1 = dimy;
00275   param_m1.nx1 = dimx;
00276   param_m1.ofy = 2;
00277   param_m1.ofx = 2;
00278   param_m1.ky = 24;
00279   param_m1.kx = 24;
00280 
00281   param_m2.nmeas = vis_test.nmeas;
00282   param_m2.ny1 = dimy;
00283   param_m2.nx1 = dimx;
00284   param_m2.ofy = 2;
00285   param_m2.ofx = 2;
00286   param_m2.ky = 24;
00287   param_m2.kx = 24;
00288 
00289   Nb = 9;
00290   Nx=dimx*dimy;
00291   Nr=Nb*Nx;
00292   Ny=param_m2.nmeas;
00293 
00294 
00295   deconv = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));
00296   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(deconv);
00297   xinc = (complex double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(complex double));
00298   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xinc);
00299   xout = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));
00300   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xout);
00301   y = (complex double*)malloc((Ny) * sizeof(complex double));
00302   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(y);
00303   y0 = (complex double*)malloc((Ny) * sizeof(complex double));
00304   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(y0);
00305   noise = (complex double*)malloc((Ny) * sizeof(complex double));
00306   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(noise);
00307   w = (double*)malloc((Nr) * sizeof(double));
00308   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(w);
00309   error = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));
00310   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(error);
00311   xoutc = (complex double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(complex double));
00312   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xoutc);
00313 
00314   wdx = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));
00315   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(wdx);
00316   wdy = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));
00317   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(wdy);
00318 
00319   double *dummyr;
00320   complex double *dummyc;
00321 
00322   dummyr = malloc(Nr * sizeof(double));
00323   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dummyr);
00324   dummyc = malloc(Nr * sizeof(complex double));
00325   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dummyc);
00326   
00327 
00328   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00329     xinc[i] = xin[i] + 0.0*I;
00330   }
00331 
00332   for (i=0; i < Nr; i++){
00333     w[i] = 1.0;
00334   }
00335   
00336   //Initialize griding matrix
00337   assert((start = clock())!=-1);
00338   purify_measurement_init_cft(&gmat, deconv, vis_test.u, vis_test.v, &param_m1);
00339   stop = clock();
00340   t = (double) (stop-start)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00341   printf("Time initalization gridding operator: %f \n\n", t);
00342   
00343   i = Nx*param_m1.ofy*param_m1.ofx;
00344   fft_temp1 = (complex double*)malloc((i) * sizeof(complex double));
00345   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fft_temp1);
00346   fft_temp2 = (complex double*)malloc((i) * sizeof(complex double));
00347   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fft_temp2);
00348 
00349     
00350   planfwd = fftw_plan_dft_2d(param_m1.nx1*param_m1.ofx, param_m1.ny1*param_m1.ofy, 
00351               fft_temp1, fft_temp1, 
00352               FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00353 
00354   planadj = fftw_plan_dft_2d(param_m1.nx1*param_m1.ofx, param_m1.ny1*param_m1.ofy, 
00355               fft_temp2, fft_temp2, 
00356               FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00357 
00358 
00359   datafwd[0] = (void*)&param_m1;
00360   datafwd[1] = (void*)deconv;
00361   datafwd[2] = (void*)&gmat;
00362   datafwd[3] = (void*)&planfwd;
00363   datafwd[4] = (void*)fft_temp1;
00364 
00365   dataadj[0] = (void*)&param_m2;
00366   dataadj[1] = (void*)deconv;
00367   dataadj[2] = (void*)&gmat;
00368   dataadj[3] = (void*)&planadj;
00369   dataadj[4] = (void*)fft_temp2;
00370 
00371   
00372   assert((start = clock())!=-1);
00373   purify_measurement_cftfwd((void*)y0, (void*)xinc, datafwd);
00374   stop = clock();
00375   t = (double) (stop-start)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00376   printf("Time forward operator: %f \n\n", t);
00377 
00378   
00379   //Noise realization
00380   //Input snr
00381   snr = 30.0;
00382   a = cblas_dznrm2(Ny, (void*)y0, 1);
00383   sigma = a*pow(10.0,-(snr/20.0))/sqrt(Ny);
00384 
00385     
00386   for (i=0; i < Ny; i++) {
00387       noise[i] = (sopt_ran_gasdev2(seedn) + sopt_ran_gasdev2(seedn)*I)*(sigma/sqrt(2));
00388       y[i] = y0[i] + noise[i];
00389   }
00390 
00391   
00392 
00393   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00394     xoutc[i] = 0.0 +0.0*I;
00395   }
00396   
00397   //Rescaling the measurements
00398 
00399   aux4 = (double)Ny/(double)Nx;
00400 
00401   for (i=0; i < Ny; i++) {
00402     y[i] = y[i]/sqrt(aux4);
00403   }
00404 
00405   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00406     deconv[i] = deconv[i]/sqrt(aux4);
00407   }
00408 
00409   //Dirty image
00410 
00411   purify_measurement_cftadj((void*)xoutc, (void*)y, dataadj);
00412 
00413   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00414     xout[i] = creal(xoutc[i]);
00415   }
00416 
00417   aux1 = purify_utils_maxarray(xout, Nx);
00418 
00419   
00420   
00421 
00422   //SARA structure initialization
00423 
00424     param5.ndict = Nb;
00425     param5.real = 0;
00426 
00427     dict_types = malloc(param5.ndict * sizeof(sopt_wavelet_type));
00428     PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dict_types);
00429 
00430 
00431     dict_types[0] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB1;
00432     dict_types[1] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB2;
00433     dict_types[2] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB3;
00434     dict_types[3] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB4;
00435     dict_types[4] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB5;
00436     dict_types[5] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB6;
00437     dict_types[6] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB7;
00438     dict_types[7] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB8;
00439     dict_types[8] = SOPT_WAVELET_Dirac;
00440 
00441 
00442     sopt_sara_initop(&param5, param_m1.ny1, param_m1.nx1, 4, dict_types);
00443 
00444   datas[0] = (void*)&param5;
00445 
00446   //Db8 structure initialization
00447 
00448     param8.ndict = 1;
00449     param8.real = 0;
00450 
00451     dict_types1 = malloc(param8.ndict * sizeof(sopt_wavelet_type));
00452     PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dict_types1);
00453 
00454     dict_types1[0] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB8;
00455     
00456     sopt_sara_initop(&param8, param_m1.ny1, param_m1.nx1, 4, dict_types1);
00457 
00458   datas1[0] = (void*)&param8;
00459 
00460   //Dirac structure initialization
00461 
00462     param9.ndict = 1;
00463     param9.real = 0;
00464 
00465     dict_types2 = malloc(param9.ndict * sizeof(sopt_wavelet_type));
00466     PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dict_types2);
00467 
00468     dict_types2[0] = SOPT_WAVELET_Dirac;
00469     
00470     sopt_sara_initop(&param9, param_m1.ny1, param_m1.nx1, 4, dict_types2);
00471 
00472   datas2[0] = (void*)&param9;
00473 
00474   //Scaling constants in the diferent representation domains
00475 
00476   sopt_sara_analysisop((void*)dummyc, (void*)xoutc, datas);
00477 
00478   for (i=0; i < Nr; i++) {
00479     dummyr[i] = creal(dummyc[i]);
00480   }
00481 
00482   aux2 = purify_utils_maxarray(dummyr, Nr);
00483 
00484   sopt_sara_analysisop((void*)dummyc, (void*)xoutc, datas1);
00485 
00486   for (i=0; i < Nr; i++) {
00487     dummyr[i] = creal(dummyc[i]);
00488   }
00489 
00490   aux3 = purify_utils_maxarray(dummyr, Nx);
00491 
00492   
00493 
00494   printf("**********************\n");
00495   printf("BPSA reconstruction\n");
00496   printf("**********************\n");
00497 
00498   
00499     
00500   //Structure for the L1 solver      
00501   param2.verbose = 2;
00502   param2.max_iter = num_iter;
00503   param2.gamma = gamma*aux2;
00504   param2.rel_obj = 0.001;
00505   param2.epsilon = sqrt(Ny + 2*sqrt(Ny))*sigma/sqrt(aux4);
00506   param2.epsilon_tol = 0.1;
00507   param2.real_data = 0;
00508   param2.cg_max_iter = 100;
00509   param2.cg_tol = 0.000001;
00510 
00511   
00512   //Initial solution
00513   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00514       xoutc[i] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00515   }
00516 
00517   assert((start = clock())!=-1);
00518   sopt_l1_sdmm((void*)xoutc, Nx,
00519                    &purify_measurement_cftfwd,
00520                    datafwd,
00521                    &purify_measurement_cftadj,
00522                    dataadj,
00523                    &sopt_sara_synthesisop,
00524                    datas,
00525                    &sopt_sara_analysisop,
00526                    datas,
00527                    Nr,
00528                    (void*)y, Ny, w, param2);
00529 
00530   stop = clock();
00531   t = (double) (stop-start)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00532 
00533   printf("Time BPSA: %f \n\n", t); 
00534 
00535   
00536 
00537     //SNR
00538     for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00539         xout[i] = creal(xoutc[i]);
00540         error[i] = xout[i] - xin[i];
00541     }
00542     mse = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, error, 1);
00543     a = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, xin, 1);
00544     snr_out = 20.0*log10(a/mse);
00545     printf("SNR: %f dB\n\n", snr_out);
00546 
00547     a = purify_utils_maxarray(xout, Nx);
00548     dr_out = sqrt((double)Nx)*a/mse;
00549     printf("DR: %f \n\n", dr_out);
00550     
00551     i = 0;
00552     results[0 + i*3] = snr_out;
00553     results[1 + i*3] = dr_out;
00554     results[2 + i*3] = t;
00555 
00556   printf("**********************\n");
00557   printf("SARA reconstruction\n");
00558   printf("**********************\n");
00559 
00560   
00561     
00562   //Structure for the L1 solver      
00563   param2.verbose = 2;
00564   param2.max_iter = num_iter;
00565   param2.gamma = gamma*aux2;
00566   param2.rel_obj = 0.001;
00567   param2.epsilon = sqrt(Ny + 2*sqrt(Ny))*sigma/sqrt(aux4);
00568   param2.epsilon_tol = 0.1;
00569   param2.real_data = 0;
00570   param2.cg_max_iter = 100;
00571   param2.cg_tol = 0.000001;
00572 
00573   //Structure for the RWL1 solver    
00574   param4.verbose = 2;
00575   param4.max_iter = 5;
00576   param4.rel_var = 0.001;
00577   param4.sigma = sigma*sqrt(Ny/(Nb*Nx));
00578   param4.init_sol = 1;
00579 
00580   
00581   start1 = omp_get_wtime();
00582   sopt_l1_rwsdmm((void*)xoutc, Nx,
00583                    &purify_measurement_cftfwd,
00584                    datafwd,
00585                    &purify_measurement_cftadj,
00586                    dataadj,
00587                    &sopt_sara_synthesisop,
00588                    datas,
00589                    &sopt_sara_analysisop,
00590                    datas,
00591                    Nr,
00592                    (void*)y, Ny, param2, param4);
00593 
00594   stop1 = omp_get_wtime();
00595   t = stop1 - start1;
00596 
00597   printf("Time RWL1: %f \n\n", t); 
00598 
00599   
00600 
00601     //SNR
00602     for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00603         xout[i] = creal(xoutc[i]);
00604         error[i] = xout[i] - xin[i];
00605     }
00606     mse = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, error, 1);
00607     a = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, xin, 1);
00608     snr_out = 20.0*log10(a/mse);
00609     printf("SNR: %f dB\n\n", snr_out);
00610 
00611     a = purify_utils_maxarray(xout, Nx);
00612     dr_out = sqrt((double)Nx)*a/mse;
00613     printf("DR: %f \n\n", dr_out);
00614     
00615     i = 1;
00616     results[0 + i*3] = snr_out;
00617     results[1 + i*3] = dr_out;
00618     results[2 + i*3] = t;

00637     param6.epsilon = sqrt(Ny + 2*sqrt(Ny))*sigma/sqrt(aux4);
